attributes.action: Stop arms, weapons and arms support contracts to Saudi Arabia and Gulf states.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government has not fulfilled it's duty to do this since it was ruled by the court to do so a year ago. This is unacceptable and diminishes the UK's reputation further across the globe.
attributes.background: According to the Guardian the UK government has not overseen the legal requirement issued a year ago to halt the sale of arms and weapons and support to Saudi Arabia. Please halt the trade in arms, weapons and support to Saudi Arabia and other Gulf states over the war in Yemen.
